CustomField.description:
Uses the Logic: cve__NetBeforeTaxes__c - cve__NetAfterTaxes__c
but if NetAfterTaxes is null then this falls back on the original logic of:
cve__NetBeforeTaxes__c - cve__Net__c
This will keep payments generated before NetAferTaxes was added in a consistent state.
CustomField.label: Taxes
